description: Gets a ReplicationConfiguration, filtered by Source Server ID.

parameters.name: sourceServerID
parameters.description: The ID of the Source Serve for this Replication Configuration.r.

nested_items.name: associateDefaultSecurityGroup
nested_items.description: Whether to associate the default Elastic Disaster Recovery Security group with the Replication Configuration.

nested_items.name: autoReplicateNewDisks
nested_items.description: Whether to allow the AWS replication agent to automatically replicate newly added disks.

nested_items.name: bandwidthThrottling
nested_items.description: Configure bandwidth throttling for the outbound data transfer rate of the Source Server in Mbps.

nested_items.name: createPublicIP
nested_items.description: Whether to create a Public IP for the Recovery Instance by default.

nested_items.name: dataPlaneRouting
nested_items.description: The data plane routing mechanism that will be used for replication.

nested_items.name: defaultLargeStagingDiskType
nested_items.description: The Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication.

nested_items.name: ebsEncryption
nested_items.description: The type of EBS encryption to be used during replication.

nested_items.name: ebsEncryptionKeyArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the EBS encryption key to be used during replication.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Replication Configuration.

nested_items.name: pitPolicy
nested_items.description: The Point in time (PIT) policy to manage snapshots taken during replication.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Whether this rule is enabled or not.

nested_items.name: interval
nested_items.description: How often, in the chosen units, a snapshot should be taken.

nested_items.name: retentionDuration
nested_items.description: The duration to retain a snapshot for, in the chosen units.

nested_items.name: ruleID
nested_items.description: The ID of the rule.

nested_items.name: units
nested_items.description: The units used to measure the interval and retentionDuration.

nested_items.name: replicatedDisks
nested_items.description: The configuration of the disks of the Source Server to be replicated.

nested_items.name: deviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the device.

nested_items.name: iops
nested_items.description: The requested number of I/O operations per second (IOPS).

nested_items.name: isBootDisk
nested_items.description: Whether to boot from this disk or not.

nested_items.name: optimizedStagingDiskType
nested_items.description: The Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication when stagingDiskType is set to Auto. This is a read-only field.

nested_items.name: stagingDiskType
nested_items.description: The Staging Disk EBS volume type to be used during replication.

nested_items.name: throughput
nested_items.description: The throughput to use for the EBS volume in MiB/s. This parameter is valid only for gp3 volumes.

nested_items.name: replicationServerInstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type to be used for the replication server.

nested_items.name: replicationServersSecurityGroupsIDs
nested_items.description: The security group IDs that will be used by the replication server.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: sourceServerID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Source Server for this Replication Configuration.

nested_items.name: stagingAreaSubnetId
nested_items.description: The subnet to be used by the replication staging area.

nested_items.name: stagingAreaTags
nested_items.description: A set of tags to be associated with all resources created in the replication staging area: EC2 replication server, EBS volumes, EBS snapshots, etc.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: useDedicatedReplicationServer
nested_items.description: Whether to use a dedicated Replication Server in the replication staging area.
